entry.title: BLACK NOCTURNAL SWEATSHIRT
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bluorng
Type: sweatshirt
Price: 9995.00

Description

THE BLACK NOCTURNAL SWEATSHIRT BY BLUORNG OFFERS A PREMIUM OVERSIZED UNISEX FIT WITH EMBROIDERY ON THE FRONT AND BACK. MADE FROM 100% BRUSHED COTTON FLEECE AND A HEAVYWEIGHT 450GSM FABRIC, IT'S SOFT AND COZY. 
PERFECT FOR LAYERING OR WEARING ON ITS OWN, THIS SWEATSHIRT BRINGS A MODERN EDGE TO YOUR EVERYDAY STYLE, MAKING IT A VERSATILE AND STYLISH ADDITION TO ANY WARDROBE.

Details

100% BRUSHED COTTON FLEECE

WEIGHT - 450 GSM

EMBROIDERY FRONT AND BACK

WASH CARE

USE COLD WATER TO PROTECT AGAINST FADING & SHRINKING.

MACHINE WASH FLEECE ON A COOL SETTING. DO NOT BLEACH. AIR DRY ONLY & TURN THEM INSIDE OUT FOR THE WASH.

shipping

SHIPPED WIHTIN 24 HOURS.

FREE DELIVERY PAN-INDIA.

DISPATCH NEXT DAY.

entry.title: BLACK SIGNAL SWEATSHIRT
entry.summary:
Vendor: Bluorng
Type: sweatshirt
Price: 8495.00

Description

BLUORNG'S SIGNAL SWEATSHIRT IS THE PERFECT COMBINATION OF STYLE AND COMFORT. WITH A PREMIUM OVERSIZED UNISEX FIT, PUFF PRINT BRANDING ON THE FRONT, AND ARTWORK ON THE BACK, IT’S DESIGNED TO TURN HEADS.
MADE FROM 100% BRUSHED COTTON FLEECE, THIS SWEATSHIRT FEELS AS GOOD AS IT LOOKS. A MUST-HAVE FOR STREETWEAR LOVERS, IT’S THE PERFECT PIECE TO ELEVATE YOUR WARDROBE.

Details

100% BRUSHED COTTON FLEECE

Weight - 450GSM

PUFF PRINT FRONT AND BACK

WASH CARE

USE COLD WATER TO PROTECT AGAINST FADING & SHRINKING.

MACHINE WASH FLEECE ON A COOL SETTING. DO NOT BLEACH. AIR DRY ONLY & TURN THEM INSIDE OUT FOR THE WASH.

shipping

Dispatch next day.
